Race.SpecificTitle: PW Proposition -- 1/8% S&U Tax Renewal - PJ - 7 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Claiborne, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), under the provisions of law, be authorized to levy and collect a tax of one-eighth of one percent (1/8%) (the "Tax") (an estimated $156,000 reasonably expected to be collected annually from levy of the Tax) upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the Parish for a period of seven (7) years, commencing January 1, 2021, with the avails or proceeds of the Tax (after paying reasonable and necessary costs of collecting and administering the Tax), to be dedicated to the conservation and development of natural resources for agricultural, commercial, residential or other purposes, including surface and ground water, promoting safety on lakes and waterways, both within and without the Parish, and including equipment and improvements necessary for the above purposes, to be administered by the Claiborne Parish Watershed District pursuant to an intergovernmental agreement with the Parish?
